basic.title: basic usage

border: normal.title: border: normal
border: normal.html:
<span
  class="drac-avatar drac-bg-green-transparent drac-text-green drac-avatar"
  title="Netto Farah"
  bordervariant="normal"
  ><span color="white" class="drac-text drac-text drac-text drac-text-white"
    >NF</span
  ></span
>
border: normal.react: function () { return (react_1.default.createElement(Avatar_1.Avatar, { title: "Netto Farah", borderVariant: variant })); }

  title="Netto Farah"
  bordervariant="large"
  ><span color="white" class="drac-text drac-text drac-text drac-text-white"
    >NF</span

>
